thread.title: NEW: $39+ Airfare Sale for 2 Days Only!
thread.title_full: NEW: $39+ Airfare Sale for 2 Days Only!

title: NEW: $39+ Airfare Sale for 2 Days Only!
text:
Home > Flight Deals > NEW: $39+ Airfare Sale for 2 Days Only! NEW: $39+ Airfare Sale for 2 Days Only! July 28, 2015 10:03am by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
JetBlue's newest airfare sale discounts domestic, Caribbean, and Latin American travel from August 25-November 18. One-way fares start at $39 (round-trip at $78), and tickets must be booked by 11:59 p.m. ET on Wednesday, July 29. 
Sale fares are applicable on all days except Fridays and Sundays, but not on September 7 or October 12. Additionally, travel to/from NYC-area airports is excluded November 4-9. EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: We found the best prices for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on the airline's sale page . Pros:
